attributes.action: Inform MP's that they should work for no pay for one month.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the fact that BA have asked their staff to work for one month for no pay (as have other companies), I feel that Members of Parliament should also do the same as a gesture of goodwill.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
